step_of_the_day.title: Think outside the box. How can creative thinking work for you today? (Pillar #5)
step_of_the_day.content:
If you are trying to solve a problem, it’s a good idea to shift your perspective. Coming from a different
            direction, you see the problem differently. By doing so, it reveals aspects you hadn’t considered. This
            offers the opportunity for new solutions.

action_step:
Today identify a problem you have been working on and trying to solve. How can you think outside the box,
            view the problem from a different direction? Think of a successful friend and imagine he or she is working
            on this issue. Imagine being this person viewing the problem. Or perhaps imagine being Oprah Winfrey or Tony
            Robbins. Put yourself in their shoes. Now look at the problem.
